description: A casual essential for warmer days, these cargo shorts are stonewashed to create a timeworn appearance and cut for a comfortable, relaxed fit.
fitting_details: Classic Fit: sits at the waist. Eased through the leg.
All Big sizes have a 10¼" inseam. All Tall sizes have an 11¼" inseam. Size 46W has an 11¼" rise.
Belt loops. Zip fly with a buttoned closure.
Two front angled pockets. Two thigh cargo pockets. Two back buttoned pockets.
"Ralph Lauren Classic Polo Original RL Quality Est 1967" twill patch above the back right pocket.

We source a portion of our cotton through the Better Cotton Initiative. By buying cotton products from us, you're supporting more sustainable cotton farming. Learn more at https://bettercotton.org/massbalance.
For more information on Ralph Lauren's product sustainability initiatives, visit https://corporate.ralphlauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style.
